title: Mixed-Methods Approach for Enhancing Attitudinal Learning in MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic theoretical knowledge and practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: In-service professionals participate with the goal of forming attitudes toward solving social issues, emphasizing activities based on personal device utilization and discussions.

learning_goals: Learners improve cognitive, affective, and behavioral changes by over 20% using self-assessment tools that measure attitude shifts in MOOC environments.
Learners analyze factors influencing their attitude changes through mixed-methods research (surveys + interviews) and submit findings in report form.
Learners identify at least three key factors (e.g., age, learning objectives) influencing attitude formation by designing learning activities incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
